The patient reports smoking cigarettes for 25 years. The patient currently smokes 20 cigarettes per day. Additionally, the patient smokes 5 cigars per week. The patient smokes 30 pack-years. The patient has made two attempts to quit smoking. The first attempt to quit smoking occurred in 2011. The second attempt to quit smoking occurred one year ago.
